title: Twisted fate icon
body: So i want the twisted fate icon but i dont really know how to get it , first off i tryed all the possible things that were posiblbe ( xD ) like collecting 25k gold in ARAM and collecting everygame 50 assists , can someone explain mmore opened detail, ty

replies.body: Can u get it in a hextech case?

There currently isn't a Twisted Icon available.  There was a limited one a while back during the [Bilgwater Event ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/bilgewater/)but the quests and event that you're referring to are no longer available.  I don't have any details on new or upcoming content, but I recommend bookmarking our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page in case anything comes up.  I hope that clears things up!
